name: PacFort
description:
This game has age restriction of 2-6 years of age

This game contains of PAC man eating yummy fruits and losing heath from bombs.

The aim of the game is to try and get as much fruit as you can and not hit any bombs.

If you were to hit any bombs you will lose one life and you start with 3 lives.

To move upwards you use the w key, to move left you use the a key, to move right you use the d key and to move down you use the s key.

Also in this game you can gain a shield by finding it during the fruit collection.

As the game gets harder and harder you can find nukes and this will eliminate all of the enemies.
